question:
Match List I with List II and choose the correct answer.

| List I | List II |
|---|---|
| 1. Nitrogen rich fertilizers | p. Ozone depletion |
| 2. Carbon dioxide | q. Eutrophication |
| 3. Carbon monoxide | r. Greenhouse effect |
| 4. CFCs | s. Air pollutant |
explanation: Nitrogen fertilizers cause Eutrophication (1-q). CO2 causes Greenhouse effect (2-r). CO is an Air pollutant (3-s). CFCs cause Ozone depletion (4-p).
